TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpMethodConstraint extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint

summary.span: 使你能够在 ASP.NET 确定 URL 是否匹配路由时定义允许使用的 HTTP 谓词。

span.span: Enables you to define which HTTP verbs are allowed when ASP.NET routing determines whether a URL matches a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你能够路由匹配限制为特定的 HTTP 谓词。The class enables you to limit route matching to certain HTTP verbs. 例如，你可以指定仅当请求的 HTTP 谓词时，路由被视为 URL 的匹配项`POST`。For example, you can specify that a route is considered a match for a URL only when the HTTP verb for the request is `POST`. 若要设置路由匹配的约束，你可以设置属性类的实例类。To set constraints for route matching, you set the property of the class to an instance of the class. 若要设置的 HTTP 谓词约束，你可以设置到一个字典元素的值对象和密钥的任何名称。To set an HTTP verb constraint, you set the value of one dictionary element to an object and the key to any name. 在方法，你可以包括在 ASP.NET 路由确定路由是否与 URL 匹配时允许用于该路由的 HTTP 谓词。In the method, you include all the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route when ASP.NET routing determines whether the route matches a URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示对象，其属性包含具有名为的项的项目`httpMethod`并具有一个值，是的一个实例类。The following example shows a object whose property contains an item that has a key named `httpMethod` and that has a value that is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]
